name: Glorb Garden
description:
*NOTE : Audio broken on web build. Download game for best experience*

"Listen up, specimen! There's been a containment breach in the agriculture wing, so we're sending you over there to deal with it. Take these seeds, and good luck!" -Scientist guy

Plant your weapons in this survival platformer! Plan your harvests and you might just live to see another wave.

CONTROLS:

A and D to move

Space to jump

Click on inventory to open

Click and drag seeds from inventory to soil

Left click on mature plant to harvest, and right click to fire
